messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: rsc, remyoudompheng),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

I hope that we will have a more powerful memory debugging setup at
some point, but this is fine for now.
https://codereview.appspot.com/6637057/ has some sketches.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3ed0d2fbb676 ***

runtime: add memorydump() debugging function

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev, remyoudompheng, rsc
http://codereview.appspot.com/6780059

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 6780059: runtime: add memorydump() debugging function
